T02D1408:156b-1: sa manta gu na sa li n'i n'a ma t'i k'a /
T02D1408:156b-3: yon tan ma lus pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa //
T02D1408:156b-4: dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1408:156b-5: 'khor lo gsum sogs ldan pa yi //
T02D1408:156b-6: bde mchog mgon la rab btud nas //
T02D1408:156b-7: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
T02D1408:156b-8: de yi rnam 'grel brjod par bya //
T02D1408:156b-9: shes pa'i nga rgyal dag kyang med //
T02D1408:156b-10: kha cig don du byas pa min //
T02D1408:156b-11: sna tshogs 'dod dang mthun pa ru //
T02D1408:156b-12: bdag nyid dran pa nyid phyir ro //
T02D1408:156b-13: mchog tu dga' ba skyed byed pa'i //
T02D1408:156b-14: dam pa'i rang bzhin gsang ba ni //
T02D1408:156b-15: mdor bsdus gdan las byung gyur pa //
T02D1408:156b-17: de la dang po brjod bya dang rjod byed dang /
T02D1408:156b-19: dgos pa'i dgos pa rnams mthong na rtog pa dang
T02D1408:156b-20: ldan pa chos kyi rjes su 'brang pa yang 'jug
T02D1408:156b-21: par 'gyur ro // de'i phyir brjod bya dang rjod byed dang 'brel pa dang /
T02D1408:156b-22: dgos pa dang dgos pa'i dgos pa bstan pas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /
T02D1408:156b-23: rtog pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa po'i gang zag
T02D1408:156b-24: 'jug pa'i yan lag tu de nyid 'dir brjod par
T02D1408:156b-25: bya ste / de nas de phyir zhes pa nas
T02D1408:156b-26: bzung ste ci snyed dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i rgyud
T02D1408:156b-27: le'u lnga bcu gcig pa'i bar gyi gzhung gi tshig
T02D1408:156b-29: gang des brjod bya dpal he ru ka dang rdo
T02D1408:156b-30: rje phag mo la sogs pa ma lus pa'i ngo
T02D1408:156b-31: bo nyid ni brjod par bya ba'o //
T02D1408:156b-32: 'dis ni brjod bya dang rjod byed bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang /
T02D1408:156b-33: thabs dang thabs las byung ba dang tshig dang tshig
T02D1408:156b-34: ni don dang bskyed bya dang skyed byed dang rgyu
T02D1408:156b-35: dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1408:156b-37: dpal he ru ka dang rdo rje phag mo la
T02D1408:156b-38: sogs pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bde ba
T02D1408:156b-39: chen po'i ye shes dngos su skyed par byed pa
T02D1408:157a-1: la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i skyon 'joms par byed pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1408:157a-2: de yang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i
T02D1408:157a-3: skyon bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas
T02D1408:157a-4: gsal te tshegs med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1408:157a-5: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'gro bas bskyed nas sems
T02D1408:157a-6: can gyi don byed pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o
T02D1408:157a-7: // bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud kyi tshogs skye 'gro
T02D1408:157a-8: gzhug par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa
T02D1408:157a-9: la sogs pas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i bar ni
T02D1408:157a-10: dgos pa yin no zhes kha cig gi'o //
T02D1408:157a-11: phyis kyi dus su de'i 'bras bu thob pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02D1408:157a-12: de yang nges par brjod pa ni bstan bcos kyi
T02D1408:157a-13: rjes su 'brang ba'i skyes bu la bstan na nye
T02D1408:157a-14: bar mkho ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1408:157a-15: 'dir ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro dpa'
T02D1408:157a-16: bo dang dpa' mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas
T02D1408:157a-17: ston pa po ni bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das
T02D1408:157a-18: mas rtogs par bya ba ni kha cig zer ro
T02D1408:157a-19: // gnyis ka yang mgrin gcig gi gsung gis ston
T02D1408:157a-20: pa po bcom ldan 'das ston pa mo bcom ldan
T02D1408:157a-21: 'das mas sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dpa' bo dang
T02D1408:157a-22: dpa' mos rtogs par bya ba ni kha cig gi'o
T02D1408:157a-23: // // sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dpa' bo dang
T02D1408:157a-24: dpa' mo'i 'khor gyis bskor nas ston pa po bcom
T02D1408:157a-25: ldan 'das ma bcom ldan 'das kyis rtogs par bya
T02D1408:157a-28: mchod bzhi de bzhin rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1408:157a-29: zhes gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1408:157a-30: dpal he ru ka la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang
T02D1408:157a-31: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1408:157a-32: la de bzhin du bos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1408:157a-33: de nas de phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1408:157a-34: la 'dir rgyud kyi dang po nyid du 'di skad
T02D1408:157a-35: bdag gis thos zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdud
T02D1408:157a-36: pa pos ci'i phyir bsam par ma byas zhes kha
T02D1408:157a-38: de yongs su spangs pa'i phyir brjod pa ni bcom
T02D1408:157a-39: ldan 'das mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D1408:157a-40: rab tu bstan pa'i don du ste /
T02D1408:157a-42: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1408:157a-44: gzhan ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud stong phrag
T02D1408:157a-45: brgya pa las btus pa nyid kyi phyir de la
T02D1408:157a-46: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud de nyid kyi dang
T02D1408:157a-47: por 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa bstan pas
T02D1408:157a-48: rgyud phyi ma 'dir ma bstan pa yin no //
T02D1408:157b-0: @157b mi gsal don ston tshig ni phyi ma yin //
T02D1408:157b-2: gzhan ni chos kyi de kho na nyid bstan du
T02D1408:157b-3: med pas bstan bya dang ston pa po gcig nyid
T02D1408:157b-5: sngags dang sku ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1408:157b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi
T02D1408:157b-8: phrad kyi tshogs 'dis rgyud phyi ma nyid du nges
T02D1408:157b-9: pa yin no // de nas ni rjes thogs te
T02D1408:157b-10: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud de'i rjes thogs su
T02D1408:157b-11: 'og nas 'byung ba 'di'i don brjod pa ni de
T02D1408:157b-12: gsal por bshad par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1408:157b-13: brjod bzhin pa'i de nas kyi sgra ni rim pa'am rgyu'i don to //
T02D1408:157b-14: yang na de nas kyi sgra'i tshig ni bkra shis pa'i don te /
T02D1408:157b-15: bstan bcos dang por bkra shis brjod pa ni 'jug
T02D1408:157b-16: pa po rnams bgegs med pa'i don yin pa'am yang
T02D1408:157b-17: na dbang du bya ba'i don to //
T02D1408:157b-18: de nyid kyi phyir sngon du bstan pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1408:157b-19: la ltos nas bkra shis pa'i don nam dbang du
T02D1408:157b-20: bya ba'i don du de nas kyi sgra brjod pa'o
T02D1408:157b-21: // de phyir gyi sgra ni bstan bcos su rim pa'am rgyu mtshan gyi don gyi phyir ro //
T02D1408:157b-22: 'on kyang 'og nas byung ba'i tshig bzhis khyad par
T02D1408:157b-23: du byas pa'i he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor
T02D1408:157b-24: zhes gsungs te / dpal gyi sgra ni bha ga'i
T02D1408:157b-25: tshig gam mchod pa'i tshig gam bsod nams sam ye
T02D1408:157b-26: shes kyi tshig gam gsang ba gsum gyi tshig go
T02D1408:157b-27: zhes gsungs te / // de nyid ye shes kyi
T02D1408:157b-28: phyag rgya rdo rje phag mo gtso bor gyur pa'i
T02D1408:157b-29: he ru ka ni he ru ka dpal lo //
T02D1408:157b-30: de'i yang dag sbyor ba ni de dang lhan cig
T02D1408:157b-31: tu ro gcig pa'i ngo bor 'khyud pa dang 'o
T02D1408:157b-32: byed pa'i sbyor pa'i sbyar ba zhes pa ni kun
T02D1408:157b-34: gzhan yang he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor ni //
T02D1408:157b-35: gnyis med mtshan ma med pa dang //
T02D1408:157b-36: smin pa'i dngos po rnam par spangs //
T02D1408:157b-37: stong nyid mngon par 'du byed med //
T02D1408:157b-38: gnas med gnas pa med pa med //
T02D1408:157b-39: gnas med gnas pa med spangs rigs //
T02D1408:157b-41: rnam bkod tshig la yang dag gnas //
T02D1408:157b-42: dpal ldan he ru ka brjod pas //
T02D1408:157b-43: brjod bya la ni the tshom med //
T02D1408:157b-44: phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D1408:157b-45: rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin brjod //
T02D1408:157b-46: ces bya ba ni don dam pa'i phyogs so //
T02D1408:157b-48: gzhan gyi gdan ni shes rab ste //
T02D1408:157b-49: bdag gi gdan ni thabs bzhin no //
T02D1408:157b-50: 'di nyid dbyer med gyur pa ni //
T02D1408:157b-51: rnal 'byor gdan du rnam par gnas //
T02D1408:157b-52: de nyid gdan ni de las byung //
T02D1408:157b-53: gang zhig de rams spangs gyur pa'i //
T02D1408:157b-54: lhan cig skyes zhes bya ba ste //
T02D1408:158a-3: khyad par ci zhes pa la gsang ba zhes gsungs te /
T02D1408:158a-4: gsang ba ni rtsa bar bya ba ste /
T02D1408:158a-5: 'di kun nyan thos la sogs pa la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1408:158a-6: yang na ni shes rab dang thabs gnyis lhan cig tu gcig tu gyur pa las /
T02D1408:158a-7: bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'o //
T02D1408:158a-8: yang na rdo rje dang padma dang byang chub kyi sems gsum ni ra ha shya'o //
T02D1408:158a-9: ra zhes bya ba rdo rjer brjod //
T02D1408:158a-10: ha zhes bya ba padma ste /
T02D1408:158a-11: de gnyis dag gi sa bon ni //
T02D1408:158a-12: shya ru mngon par bstan pa'o //
T02D1408:158a-13: de la ra ni rdo rje rtse mo dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1408:158a-14: ha ni khva gdong ma'i phyir dang /
T02D1408:158a-15: sa dang ya gnyis sbyar ba ni gnyis ka'i sa bon gyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ram //
T02D1408:158a-16: rten dang brten pa nyid gcig gi ngo bo'i phyir ro //
T02D1408:158a-17: gsang ba'i sgras ni rdo rje dang padma dang byang
T02D1408:158a-18: chub kyi sems su bstan pa de nyid kyi phyir
T02D1408:158a-19: / thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyi rol ni //
T02D1408:158a-20: dbang po don gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1408:158a-21: gzugs la sogs par snang ba ni //
T02D1408:158a-22: sems nyid de ltar snang ba'o //
T02D1408:158a-24: yang khyad par ci lta bu de zhes pa la //
T02D1408:158a-25: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
T02D1408:158a-27: thams cad kyi 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ste /
T02D1408:158a-28: de nyid ni don te dgos pa'o //
T02D1408:158a-29: de sgrub par byed pa po ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1408:158a-30: yang na thams cad du 'dod pa ni khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
T02D1408:158a-31: yang ji lta bu zhes pa la /
T02D1408:158a-32: phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste //
T02D1408:158a-34: bstan bya dang ston pa po dbyer med pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D1408:158a-35: gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa bla ma'i rgyud
T02D1408:158a-36: de rnams las kyang de bla mar gyur pa nyid
T02D1408:158a-38: yang ci lta bur gyur pa zhes pa la /
T02D1408:158a-39: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom //
T02D1408:158a-41: mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad do //
T02D1408:158a-42: dra ba ni de'i cho gas so //
T02D1408:158a-43: sdom pa ni de bsdams shing sbas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1408:158a-45: dee las nam mkha' la 'gro ba ste /
T02D1408:158a-46: da ni ldan pa'i don te /
T02D1408:158a-47: yang na mkha' 'gro rnams dang nye bar ldan pa'i
T02D1408:158a-48: tshul nyid kyi phyir phyi rol du 'gro ba 'gog
T02D1408:158b-0: par byed pa nyid @158b kyis dra ba nyid sdom
T02D1408:158b-1: par byed pa nyid kyi phyir mkha' 'gro ma'i dra
T02D1408:158b-2: ba'i sdom pa'o // de nyid ji ltar brjod ces pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1408:158b-3: mdor bsdus pa ste zhes gsungs te /
T02D1408:158b-4: mdor bsdus pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud
T02D1408:158b-5: rgyas pa las yang dag par bsdus zhes bya ba'i
T02D1408:158b-6: don to // de nyid kyi don gsal bar bya ba'i phyir rgyas pa min zhes gsungs so //
T02D1408:158b-7: yang na mdor bsdus pa ma yin te ci'i phyir rgyas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1408:158b-8: 'dir de'i bsam pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
T02D1408:158b-9: rgyud ni gzhung rgyas la 'dir don rgyas pa nyid
T02D1408:158b-10: de / khams gsum gyi bdag nyid 'khor lo gsum bshad pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1408:158b-11: khams gsum gyi bdag nyid yin pas bcom ldan 'das
T02D1408:158b-12: he ru ka dpal yang dag par sbyor bas zhes
T02D1408:158b-13: bya ba ni / khyad par du bya ba'i tshig go //
T02D1408:158b-14: gsang ba ni de khyad par du byed pa ste /
T02D1408:158b-15: de nyid kyi phyir 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
T02D1408:158b-16: phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste //
T02D1408:158b-17: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom //
T02D1408:158b-18: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par du byed pa'i tshig gsungs so //
T02D1408:158b-19: 'dis bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka gtso bo bdag nyid che ba bstan nas /
T02D1408:158b-20: dang por gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1408:158b-22: gsang ba'i sgras ni 'khor lo gsum po la sogs
T02D1408:158b-23: la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma shes par bya ste
T02D1408:158b-24: / de la gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid nyid ni gsang ba ste /
T02D1408:158b-25: ro gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams
T02D1408:158b-26: kun du song ba'i bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru
T02D1408:158b-27: ka rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa dang yang
T02D1408:158b-28: dag par ldan pa'i 'dir de'i gnas nyid do //
T02D1408:158b-29: mchog ni phul du byung ba ste /
T02D1408:158b-30: gtso bo gong na med pa 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D1408:158b-31: rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi gzhi nyid kyi
T02D1408:158b-33: yang ji lta bu zhes pa la /
T02D1408:158b-35: bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i rol pa'i thugs rjes dga' ba nyid kyi phyir dgyes pa'o //
T02D1408:158b-37: lha yi sku yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1408:158b-38: rang bzhin med pa'i don goms na //
T02D1408:158b-39: mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ni //
T02D1408:159a-3: de ltar 'dir phyi'i mchod pa zhes bya ba med
T02D1408:159a-4: pas de'i med pa nyid kyang mtshon pa ma yin
T02D1408:159a-5: no // yang ci lta bur gyur pa zhes pa la /
T02D1408:159a-6: thams cad bdag nyid ces gsungs te /
T02D1408:159a-7: 'dis ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gzhan med par gsungs so //
T02D1408:159a-8: thams cad bdag nyid ni khams gsum gyi bdag nyid
T02D1408:159a-9: 'khor lo la sogs pa la rnam par gnas pa'i
T02D1408:159a-10: bdag nyid ni phyi rol gyi bdag nyid dam nang
T02D1408:159a-11: gi bdag nyid du 'dir zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1408:159a-12: // rtag tu gnas zhes pa ni rtag tu ni
T02D1408:159a-13: kha cig gam gang du yang rgyun chad pa med
T02D1408:159a-14: // par bstan to // gnas zhes bya ba ni
T02D1408:159a-15: khams gsum rnam par gnon pa gcig tu nyams pa
T02D1408:159a-16: med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1408:159a-17: da ni brjod par bya ba phun sum tshogs pa ston te /
T02D1408:159a-18: mkha' 'gro kun dngos zhes pa ni //
T02D1408:159a-19: mkha' 'gro'i sgras ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02D1408:159a-20: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhes rtogs par bya ste /
T02D1408:159a-21: rang bzhin la ma ya ta'i rkyen byin pas ro gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1408:159a-23: sems can thams cad kyi don nus pa nyid kyi
T02D1408:159a-24: phyir ram brtson 'grus chen po phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1408:159a-25: nyid kyi phyir mchog tu bstan pa'i yon tan dang
T02D1408:159a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje ni dbyer med
T02D1408:159a-28: pa'i ye shes nyid kyi phyir ram sems can thams
T02D1408:159a-29: cad la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1408:159a-30: seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po
T02D1408:159a-31: la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa nyid
T02D1408:159a-32: kyi sems dpa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1408:159a-33: shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir
T02D1408:159a-34: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la nye bar
T02D1408:159a-35: mkho ba nyid kyis mchog tu phul du byung ba
T02D1408:159a-37: bla na med pa'i mchod par 'os pas mchog gi
T02D1408:159a-38: bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi
T02D1408:159a-39: phyir bde ba ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
T02D1408:159a-40: bde ba'i sgra sgrub pa ni ma ning gi rtags yin no //
T02D1408:159a-41: 'dis thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi tshig la sogs
T02D1408:159a-42: pa rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don phun sum
T02D1408:159a-44: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na thams cad kyi
T02D1408:159b-0: @159b bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das
T02D1408:159b-1: mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' bde ba mchog la
T02D1408:159b-2: rtag tu gnas so zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1408:159b-3: yang na khams dang phyag rgya dang 'bras bu bsdus
T02D1408:159b-4: pa'i yan lag rnam par thar pa dang dga' ba
T02D1408:159b-5: dang skad cig dbang la sogs pa ru rdo rje
T02D1408:159b-6: sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems
T02D1408:159b-7: dpa' mchog tu bde bas rtag tu bzhugs so zhes
T02D1408:159b-8: sbyar ro // ci lha gzhan khyad par can byed
T02D1408:159b-9: pa yin nam zhes dogs pa spang bar bya ba'i
T02D1408:159b-10: don du 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1408:159b-11: sbyar ro // gsungs te / 'di ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1408:159b-12: rang byung ni bcom ldan 'das rang nyid de gzhan
T02D1408:159b-13: las byung ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1408:159b-15: sems can kun la gang gi sems //
T02D1408:159b-16: brtan pa'i phyir na sems par brjod //
T02D1408:159b-17: bsam gtan la ni yi dam gyis //
T02D1408:159b-18: brtan par gyur pas rdo rje'o //
T02D1408:159b-19: sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba yis //
T02D1408:159b-20: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur //
T02D1408:159b-21: de yang kha cig gang yang ma byas pas na rang byung du brjod do //
T02D1408:159b-22: bcom ldan 'das ni skal pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir ram /
T02D1408:159b-23: bdud bzhi 'joms pa nyid kyi phyir ram /
T02D1408:159b-24: ma lus pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan no //
T02D1408:159b-25: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang //
T02D1408:159b-26: dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang //
T02D1408:159b-27: brtson 'grus drug po 'di dang yang dag par ldan pas bcom ldan du brjod de //
T02D1408:159b-28: 'di la de yod pas bcom ldan no //
T02D1408:159b-30: bha yi rnam pa bha gar brjod //
T02D1408:159b-31: ga ni nam mkha'i yi ge ste /
T02D1408:159b-32: gnyis po yang ni mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1408:159b-33: shes rab thabs dang bcom ldan no //
T02D1408:159b-35: de yod pas na bcom ldan no //
T02D1408:159b-36: yang na bha ga la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan no //
T02D1408:159b-37: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02D1408:159b-38: 'di la dpa' bo nyid ni dpa' bo ste /
T02D1408:159b-39: dpa' ba nyid dang ldan pas gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par bcad pa'i don to //
T02D1408:159b-40: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par cod pan ni srod sgrub kho na gzhu 'dzin pa lta bu'o //
T02D1408:160a-0: yang na dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag @160a * //
T02D1408:160a-1: nyid kyi phyir gzhan ma yin pa nyid du brjod do //
T02D1408:160a-2: de nyid kyi phyir mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1408:160a-3: yang na mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud mtho bar gyur pa rtogs par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1408:160a-4: da ni bskyed pa'i rim pa la sogs pa sgrub
T02D1408:160a-5: pa la yang phyin ci log dgag pa'i don du
T02D1408:160a-6: 'khor lo gsum la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i bcom
T02D1408:160a-7: ldan 'das de'i bskyed pa'i rim pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1408:160a-8: go rims la sogs pa ston pa ni //
T02D1408:160a-9: srid pa sgra tshul las nges 'byung //
T02D1408:160a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1408:160a-11: rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis //
T02D1408:160a-12: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs te /

T02D1408:160a-15: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bdud rtsi lnga'i ri
T02D1408:160a-16: lu khar bcug pa'i sngags pas phyogs bcu mngon du

T02D1408:160a-18: du sprul te tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o
T02D1408:160a-19: byas te / // aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um phat /
T02D1408:160a-20: aom gri hna grihna h'um phat /
T02D1408:160a-21: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um phat /
T02D1408:160a-23: bha ga b'am badzra h'um phat /

T02D1408:160a-27: phur bu dang thob ba bsams la /
T02D1408:160a-28: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gha ta ya /

T02D1408:160a-34: dzny'a pa ya ta sarba bighn'am k'a ya w'a ktsitta
T02D1408:160a-35: badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1408:160a-36: aom badzra mungga ra badzra k'i la ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat /
T02D1408:160a-37: ces bya ba las phur bus btab cing brdung ngo //
T02D1408:160a-38: de nas rang gi snying gar kam yongs su gyur pa las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02D1408:160a-39: de'i stong du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1408:160a-40: de las h'um sna tshogs pa'i 'do zer 'phro ba rnam par bsams te /

T02D1408:160a-42: yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal nas de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D1408:160b-0: de'i rjes la sems @160b can thams cad la phan
T02D1408:160b-1: pa dang bde ba'i rgyur dpal he ru ka yin
T02D1408:160b-2: no zhes lan gsum du brjod la /

T02D1408:160b-4: rims bzhin du spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying
T02D1408:160b-5: gar bsams la // he ni chos thams cad rgyu dang bral ba'o //
T02D1408:160b-6: ru ni chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1408:160b-7: ka ni chos thams cad gang du yang mi gnas
T02D1408:160b-8: pa'o zhes rang gi bdag nyid dang de bzhin du
T02D1408:160b-9: phyi rol gyi brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i don kun
T02D1408:160b-10: nas snang ba med par byas la //
T02D1408:160b-11: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang las //
T02D1408:160b-12: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum nam
T02D1408:160b-13: mkha'i phyogs su steng dang bar dang 'og tu go
T02D1408:160b-14: rims bzhin du nye bar dmigs la /
T02D1408:160b-15: h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i lte ba la h'um ngo //
T02D1408:160b-16: de las byung ba'i de'i rnam pa can gyi 'od
T02D1408:160b-17: zer gyis sems can ma lus pa'i don byed pa

T02D1408:160b-35: n'a da tsam yang mi dmigs par gzhag par bya'o //

T02D1408:160b-40: de'i steng du sum las ri rab gru bzhi pa

T02D1408:160b-42: mdzes pa'o // de'i steng du aa las sna tshogs kyi rdo rje'o //

T02D1408:161a-28: bcings pa rna ba'i dar dbyangs dang rdo rje'i phreng

T02D1408:161b-12: phag gi zhal bcom ldan 'das kyi mdog can nam /

T02D1408:161b-27: aom bam rdo rje phag mo ni lte bar ro //

T02D1408:161b-30: hrim hr'im skyod byed ma ni mgo la'o //

T02D1408:162a-15: lho phyogs su ko sa lar rdo rje h'um mdzad dang chang 'thung ma'o //

T02D1408:162a-18: rlung du k'anytsir 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma'o //

T02D1408:162a-24: lho phyogs su gser gling du nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o //

T02D1408:162a-26: bden bral du sindhur padma gar dbang dang stobs chen ma'o //

T02D1408:162b-28: ngam / thod pa dang ro langs so //
T02D1408:162b-29: dpa' bo'i g-yas dang cig shos na rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02D1408:162b-30: yang na kha tv'am ga dang rde'u chung ngo //
T02D1408:162b-31: thugs kyi rdo re'i mthu las byung ba'i phyir /

T02D1408:184a-3: pa ste zhi ba'i gnas skabs su byed pa'o //
T02D1408:184a-4: chu bo rgyun phyogs las bzlog nas 'bab par ston pa ni byang chub kyi sems 'gog pa'o //
T02D1408:184a-5: dbang po zlog par byed pa ni khros pa brgyud pa'i dbang po 'ching bar byed pa'o //
T02D1408:184a-6: sa g-yo bar byed pa zhes pa ni /
T02D1408:184a-7: sems can che ba las kyang che bar gyur pa skyod par byed pa'o //
T02D1408:184a-8: shing las 'jogs te gang 'dod pa der 'gro bar
T02D1408:184a-9: byed do zhes pa ni rig pa ni sdong po
T02D1408:184a-10: ste de yod pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur
T02D1408:184a-11: ro // sngags thams cad kyi nus pa 'phrog par
T02D1408:184a-12: byed pa ni 'jig rten gsum na gang cung zad
T02D1408:184a-13: gnas pa'i gsang bar brjod pa de thams cad 'khrul
T02D1408:184a-14: 'khor la zhon nas de ltar brjod pa'o //
T02D1408:184a-15: dngos grub thams cad 'phrog par byed do zhes pa
T02D1408:184a-16: ni rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa thams cad
T02D1408:184a-17: dang 'brel pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'phrog
T02D1408:184a-19: khrag 'dren par byed pa zhes pa ni bsrung ba
T02D1408:184a-20: mang po dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang 'brel ba
T02D1408:184a-22: slar gtong bar byed pa ni rang gnas su 'jog pa'o //
T02D1408:184a-23: gzugs brgya stong du mar byed do zhes pa ni
T02D1408:184a-24: ma lus pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir
T02D1408:184a-25: rang gi thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa las
T02D1408:184a-26: de'i rnam pa can gyis ma lus pa'i nam mkha'
T02D1408:184a-27: khyab par sngags dang lha spro ba'o //
T02D1408:184a-28: 'dod na snang bar byed cing 'dod na mi snang bar byed do zhes pa ni /
T02D1408:184a-29: lha mo rnams ji ltar 'dod pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:184a-30: khang bzangs dang shing gi rtse mo la sogs pa phye mar byed do zhes pa ni /
T02D1408:184a-31: khang bzangs ni padma ste sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1408:184a-32: sdong po ni rdo rje ste rdo rje ni skyes bu nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1408:184a-33: rtse mo ni lha mo rnams kyi padma'i ze 'bru ste /
T02D1408:184a-34: tha ma dang 'bring dang rab rnams la 'dod pas
T02D1408:184a-35: rdo rje padma gnyis bskyod pas ltos pa med pas
T02D1408:184a-37: dug bdud rtsir byed do zhes pa ni dug bdud
T02D1408:184a-38: rtsi dang 'dra bar bstan no zhes pa'i don to
T02D1408:184a-39: // bdud rtsi yang dug tu byed do zhes pa
T02D1408:184b-0: ni bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba'i yul @184b yang du
T02D1408:184b-2: shin tu chags par mi byed ces pa'i don to //
T02D1408:184b-3: zla ba chur byed pa ni byang chub kyi sems 'o ma bzhin du 'thung bar byed do //
T02D1408:184b-4: chu zla bar byed do zhes pa ni chu zla ba dang 'dra bar slong ba ste /
T02D1408:184b-5: de bzhin du zla ba'i btung ba bzhin du myong bar byed ces pa'i don to //
T02D1408:184b-6: dri thams cad 'phrog par byed do zhes pa ni //
T02D1408:184b-7: bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i dri 'phrog pa'o //
T02D1408:184b-8: gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed do zhes
T02D1408:184b-9: pa ni de'i dri gzhan bram ze la sogs pa'i
T02D1408:184b-10: zas la 'pho bar byed do zhes pa'i don to
T02D1408:184b-11: // 'di nyid kyi phyir legs par bstan pa'i don
T02D1408:184b-12: gsal bar byed pa ni nam mkha' lding gi gdong
T02D1408:184b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1408:184b-14: nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gdong bzhin du 'gro ba 'byin par byed ces pa ni /
T02D1408:184b-15: nam mkha' la 'gro 'dod pa'i bya khyung ni gshog pa gnyis skyong bar byed do //
T02D1408:184b-16: gang ji lta bu zhi ba'i 'dus pa la bud
T02D1408:184b-17: med rnams dang gang mnyam par sbyor ba ni khams
T02D1408:184b-18: byang chub kyi sems blangs te lha mo'i zhal du
T02D1408:184b-19: sbyin par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:184b-20: yang na gzhung gzhan te gdong gtso bor gyur pa
T02D1408:184b-21: ni bya khyung gi gdong ste bya rnams las bya
T02D1408:184b-22: khyung gi gdong gtso bor gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1408:184b-23: des khyad par can gyi cho gas 'gro ba rtogs par gnas par byed pa ni gnas pa ste /
T02D1408:184b-24: ji ltar 'gro 'dod pa'i bya khyung gshog pa gnyis skyong bar byed do //
T02D1408:184b-25: de lta bur zhi ba'i 'dus pa lha mo rnams
T02D1408:184b-26: dang gang mnyam par spyod cing gdong gis sbrang rtsi
T02D1408:184b-27: blangs nas lha mo'i kha ru ster ro zhes pa'i
T02D1408:184b-28: don to // mi'i mchog ces pa ni mi gang
T02D1408:184b-29: de ltar spyod pa ni de 'jig rten gsum gyi
T02D1408:184b-30: gtso bo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:184b-31: 'dis ni bya khyung gi gdong dang 'gro ba 'byin pas zhes pa'i gzhung gzhan ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:184b-32: de'i lag pa'i mthil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang 'phrog par mi nus zhes pa ni /
T02D1408:184b-33: de ltar gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa 'dod cing sprul
T02D1408:184b-34: pa la rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang dgag par
T02D1408:184b-35: mi nus zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:184b-36: de ltar zhes bya ba nas gzung ste don ji
T02D1408:184b-37: lta ba de ltar phul du byung ba nyid du
T02D1408:184b-38: nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1408:185a-0: dur khrod kyi sol ba zhes pa'i don @185a * //
T02D1408:185a-1: gyi gdams ngag brjod par bya ste /
T02D1408:185a-2: ba ru ra'i sdong bo'i lho phyogs kyi yal ga
T02D1408:185a-3: gtum mo'i sta re la sogs pas bcad nas nag
T02D1408:185a-4: po'i phyogs kyi tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo dur khrod
T02D1408:185a-5: du bsregs la bong bu'i chus me bsad la //
T02D1408:185a-6: de'i sol pa dang thal bar byas la /
T02D1408:185a-7: gang de ltar mchog tu khyad par can gyi sol
T02D1408:185a-8: bas phyis kyi dus su rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho
T02D1408:185a-9: ga byas na de'i 'bras bu bzlog par mi nus
T02D1408:185a-10: so // aa ti mug ta'i lcug ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1408:185a-11: de la 'di'i man ngag gi sngags 'bum phrag gcig
T02D1408:185a-12: bzlas pa'i sngags pas zla ba gzas gzung ba'i dus
T02D1408:185a-13: su aa ti mug ta'i rtsa bar khri bcas la
T02D1408:185a-14: de'i steng du bsdad la bsrung pa la sogs pa
T02D1408:185a-15: dmigs la gzhon nu mas bka' ba'i skud pa dmar
T02D1408:185a-16: po byas la / nub phyogs kyi char son pa'i yal ga de la skud pas dkris te /
T02D1408:185a-17: phyogs gcig tu skra grol ba'i sngags pas gzas gzung
T02D1408:185a-18: ba nas brtsams te btang gi bar du de'i yal
T02D1408:185a-19: ga lag pa g-yon pas gzung la rgyun chad par
T02D1408:185a-20: bzlas par bya'o // phyis kyi dus su mtshon chas
T02D1408:185a-21: bcad la ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin bya
T02D1408:185a-22: bzlas par bya'o // ste / rtse mo dang rtsa bas nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D1408:185a-25: lhag mas ni song ba'i don nyid do //
T02D1408:185a-26: zas skom la sogs ro yis ni //
T02D1408:185a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sgrub pa po rnyed par sla ba thams cad brjod pa'o //
T02D1408:185a-28: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rtsa ba'i
T02D1408:185a-29: sngags kyi las tshogs kyi cho ga'i le'u dgu ba'i
T02D1408:185a-31: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:185a-32: chos zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni srub po po'i sku gsum gyi rnam gzhag ston te /
T02D1408:185a-33: de la 'di'i man ngag ni h'um gcig las rdzogs
T02D1408:185a-34: pa'i 'khor lo gsum la sogs par gnas pa'i gnas
T02D1408:185a-36: mang po kun lus la gcig tu bsdus te go
T02D1408:185a-37: cha thams cad la sogs pas go bgos nas bzlas
T02D1408:185a-38: pa'i gnas skabs thams cad ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T02D1408:185a-39: sku'o // de'i rjes su snying gar padma dang zla
T02D1408:185a-40: ba la a'a li dang k'a li spro ba dang
T02D1408:185b-0: bsdu ba @185b la sogs pa'i gnas skabs ni chos
T02D1408:185b-2: rim dang rim min ma yin pas //
T02D1408:185b-3: ye shes longs spyod rdzogs pa dang //
T02D1408:185b-4: sprul pa thob par 'don mi za //
T02D1408:185b-5: zhes bya ba 'dis ni lhag ma rnams go sla'o //
T02D1408:185b-6: gsang sngags 'di'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1408:185b-7: gsang sngags 'di ni rtsa ba'i nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so //
T02D1408:185b-8: snying po ni snying po'i gsang sngags te /
T02D1408:185b-9: de yang snying po las kyang snying po'i las kyi cho ga zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:185b-10: snying po gsang ba'i sngags kyi sgrub pa po ni
T02D1408:185b-11: dpal he ru ka nyid sgrub pa po nyid cig
T02D1408:185b-13: da rdo rje phag mos sam /
T02D1408:185b-14: gsang ba'i sgrub pa po yang da nyid yin gyi zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1408:185b-15: lhag ma ni ci lta ba'i don nyid do //
T02D1408:185b-16: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i sku gsum
T02D1408:185b-17: dang grub pa'i snying po'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u
T02D1408:185b-20: // / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya //
T02D1408:185b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:185b-22: bden par smra ba dang yun ring por mig mi 'dzums pa zhes pa ni /
T02D1408:185b-23: kha cig mig yun ring por gdangs pa la zer te /
T02D1408:185b-24: gzhan ni myur du 'dzums pa la 'dod do //
T02D1408:185b-26: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i skye ba
T02D1408:185b-27: bdun pa'i mtshan nyid cho ga'i le'u bcu gcig pa'i
T02D1408:185b-29: / de nas nye ba'i snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:185b-30: lcags gsum zhes pa ni gser dang dngul dang zangs ma'o //
T02D1408:185b-31: mi'i thod pa sha med par byas la zhes pa
T02D1408:185b-32: ni mi'i thod pa la sogs pa dri ma med
T02D1408:185b-33: pa blangs pa gang yin pa de ltar byas la
T02D1408:185b-34: sngon du bsnyen pa byas la sngags pas skad cig
T02D1408:185b-35: gis rdo rje drag po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
T02D1408:185b-36: h'um brjod pa gnyis kyis rang sna bug g-yas pa'i
T02D1408:185b-37: nang nas dum skyes mtshon cha thogs pa phyung la
T02D1408:185b-38: gang gi ming byas pa'i gnas lnga ste /
T02D1408:185b-39: bshang lam dang rdo rje dang snying ga dang mgrin
T02D1408:185b-40: pa dang dpral ba dang mgo bor phug nas khrag
T02D1408:185b-41: gi rgyun gyis thod pa yongs su gang bar bsgom
T02D1408:185b-42: zhing sdigs mdzub kyi rtse mos mnyes na khrag 'gugs
T02D1408:186a-0: pa'o // yang dgongs pa'i don du skye bo la g-yon pas @186a * //
T02D1408:186a-1: dal bus zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mnyes shing
T02D1408:186a-2: bsgrub bya de nyid mnyes shing bsgrub bya de nyid
T02D1408:186a-3: kyi lus yongs su gang bar bsgoms na sos par
T02D1408:186a-4: 'gyur ro zhes pa ni gdams ngag go //
T02D1408:186a-5: mngon par bsngags la zhes pa ni gsal lo //
T02D1408:186a-6: 'o ma'am chang gis thod pa bkang bas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1408:186a-7: gi wang zhes bya ba la sogs pa las kyi
T02D1408:186a-8: tshogs kyi khyad par gsungs pa thams cad ni don
T02D1408:186a-11: gal te nus pa skyes pa ma yin na de'i
T02D1408:186a-12: che yi ge'i grangs kyi 'bum bzlas la thams cad
T02D1408:186a-14: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i nye ba'i
T02D1408:186a-15: snying po'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'i
T02D1408:186a-17: / de nas go cha'i las rnams ni //
T02D1408:186a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1408:186a-19: go cha rigs gcig tu bstan pas dpa' bo dang
T02D1408:186a-20: rnal 'byor ma kun zin yang mdor bsdus nas 'di
T02D1408:186a-21: ru de go cha'i sngags kyi tshig gi las kyi
T02D1408:186a-22: tshogs yin pa ni 'dir rigs pa'o //
T02D1408:186a-23: rnal 'byor ma drug gi las ni tshig sgrub pa
T02D1408:186a-24: dang dgug pa'i cho ga'i le'ur rnal 'byor drug gi
T02D1408:186a-25: go cha'i tshig gi las kyi tshogs 'og nas ston
T02D1408:186a-27: de'i phyir dpa' bo drug gi go cha'i snying po'i
T02D1408:186a-28: tshig gi las tshogs ni 'di yin no zhes pa'i
T02D1408:186a-29: don to // lhag ma ni gsal ba nyid do //
T02D1408:186a-30: skar ma rgyal gyi sbyor ba zhes pa ni //
T02D1408:186a-31: rgyal gsum gzung ngo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:186a-33: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i go cha'i
T02D1408:186a-34: sngags kyi sbyor ba'i cho ga le'u bcu gsum pa'i
T02D1408:186a-36: / sgrub pa de ni bshad par bya //
T02D1408:186a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:186a-38: rang gi khrag la lan gsum bzlas //
T02D1408:186a-39: de 'dir yang ni kha ru gzhug / ces bya'o //
T02D1408:186a-40: phyi rol ma lus pa'i rnal 'byor ma la sogs
T02D1408:186a-41: pa mngon par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor dmigs nas phyugs
T02D1408:186a-43: de ltar yang bong bu'i rnal 'byor lhag par dbang bar bstan te /
T02D1408:186a-44: de la 'di'i gdams ngag gi rim pa ni ji
T02D1408:186a-45: ltar dbang gi don gyi dkyil 'khor bzhin du phyi
T02D1408:186a-46: rol khor yug chen po'i bar bri'o //
T02D1408:186a-47: de la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ge sar gyi
T02D1408:186b-0: @186b dbus su a'a li k'a lis bskor ba'i h'um
T02D1408:186b-1: ngo // phyogs bzhi'i 'dab ma la gnyis ka'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1408:186b-2: mtshams bzhi'i 'dab ma la thod pa khrag gis gang ba bzhi'o //
T02D1408:186b-3: rtsibs nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams su thod pa'i dum
T02D1408:186b-4: bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i
T02D1408:186b-5: sngags so // rtsa ba'i thig nang du khva gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi sngags so //
T02D1408:186b-6: rtsa ba'i thig gi steng gi sgo bzhi'i nang du
T02D1408:186b-7: gnod mdzes kyi sngags go rims ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1408:186b-8: du tshig bzhi'o // ra ba gnyis la ni rtsa ba'i sngags so //
T02D1408:186b-9: ra ba'i phyi rol dang sgo'i steng dang sgo khyung
T02D1408:186b-10: brgyad dang mtshams rnams su gnyis ka'i go cha'i sngags
T02D1408:186b-11: so // khor yug la ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i sngags so //
T02D1408:186b-12: de bzhin du dpa' bo 'od zer gyi rnam pas
T02D1408:186b-13: pull'i ra ma la ya la sogs pa'i go cha
T02D1408:186b-14: chen po'i sa bon gyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1408:186b-15: 'khor lo de'i dbus su s'a lu khur ba'i rang bzhin gyi bong bu'i gzugs byas la bzhag ste /
T02D1408:186b-16: de yang rgya skyegs dang mar nag gis byugs la
T02D1408:186b-17: kha nas khrag 'dzag pa'i bong bu'i rnal 'byor du
T02D1408:186b-18: dmigs la grva bzhir mar me sbar te mngon par
T02D1408:186b-19: 'dod pa'i sngags kyis 'dis sngon bzhin du byas la
T02D1408:186b-20: yi dam la dga' bas sngags bzlas na gang dang
T02D1408:186b-21: gang du yang gyur ba'i rang bzhin de dang de
T02D1408:186b-22: mthong ba ni gdams ngag go //
T02D1408:186b-23: de'i gtor ma zhes pa ni bza' zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:186b-25: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i bong bu'i
T02D1408:186b-26: rnal 'byor gyis dpal he ru kar byed pa'i cho
T02D1408:186b-27: ga'i le'u bcu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1408:186b-29: // / de nas sdom pa thams cad la //
T02D1408:186b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ni yi ge'i brda ston te /
T02D1408:186b-31: de yang ji lta ba nyid de 'on kyang di
T02D1408:186b-32: ta zhes bya ba la sogs pas mngon par brjod
T02D1408:186b-33: pa ni gnas skabs kyi tshig tu shes par bya'o
T02D1408:186b-34: // l'a ma yang de bzhin zhes pa ni l'a
T02D1408:186b-35: ma'i rigs su gyur pa ni nga yin no zhes
T02D1408:186b-36: // dgongs so // de ltar gzhan la yang ngo //
T02D1408:186b-37: byin pa gnyis zhes pa ni khyed dang lhan cig tu sbyor bar 'dod pa'o //
T02D1408:186b-39: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i yi ge'i
T02D1408:187a-0: brda'i cho ga'i le'u bco lnga pa'i 'grel @187a *
T02D1408:187a-3: // / de nas zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:187a-4: bza' dang bza' min zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1408:187a-5: ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas
T02D1408:187a-6: go sla'o // bza' dang bza' min rab sbyin bya //
T02D1408:187a-8: rang gi dam tshig dang gzhan gyi dam tshig mi
T02D1408:187a-9: spyad par lha mo rnams kyi 'dod pa la 'jug
T02D1408:187a-11: de nyid kyi don yang gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs te /
T02D1408:187a-12: mchog gi phul du byung ba'i dam tshig ni mchog
T02D1408:187a-13: gis te mchog gi dam tshig 'di la gnas pa'o
T02D1408:187a-14: // mchog gi dam tshig la gnas pa 'di nyid
T02D1408:187a-15: kyi phyir yid shes par byed pa yid dang rjes
T02D1408:187a-16: su mthun pa la bza' bya dang bza' bya ma
T02D1408:187a-17: yin pa rab tu sbyin no zhes bya'o //
T02D1408:187a-18: de nyid kyis rjes su mthun par gsal bar byas pa'o //
T02D1408:187a-19: yang na gzhan gyi rjod byed de //
T02D1408:187a-20: de yi brjod bya ston pa'o //
T02D1408:187a-21: de nas bza' dang bza' min pa //
T02D1408:187a-22: mdor bsdus nas ni rab bshad bya //
T02D1408:187a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mchog gi dam tshig
T02D1408:187a-24: ni rnal 'byor gyi rjes su mthun par gnas pa'o
T02D1408:187a-25: // bza' bya dang bza' bya ma yin pa'i rang
T02D1408:187a-26: gi dam tshig dang gzhan gyi dam tshig gi bza'
T02D1408:187a-27: ba bza' bas yid ches par byed cing yid dang
T02D1408:187a-28: rjes su mthun pa'i bza' bas snyan grags chen po

T02D1408:203b-17: sngags kyi yi ge bltas la der gtogs pa'i yid
T02D1408:203b-18: kyis sngon du bstan pa'i chu la sogs par bzlas
T02D1408:203b-19: pa bya'o // lus kyis sbyor ba dang po'o //
T02D1408:203b-20: nye ba'i snying po la sogs pa'i sngags 'bum la
T02D1408:203b-21: sogs pa bzlas pa'i rim pas yongs su brtag par
T02D1408:203b-23: yid kyi nus pas de bzhin du phyin nas las
T02D1408:203b-24: kyi rjes su 'brang ste phyi rol du sbyar bar
T02D1408:203b-25: bya'o // gsum pa dag ni ngag nyid kyi //
T02D1408:203b-27: yang na gzhung gzhan la sogs pa ni yongs su
T02D1408:203b-28: rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i dkyil
T02D1408:203b-29: 'khor gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lag pa g-yon par
T02D1408:203b-30: yang 'di nyid kyi dpa' bo'i sngags bsams la deng
T02D1408:203b-31: gtogs pa'i yid kyis shing zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1408:203b-32: pa'i tshig gis de la bzlas par bya'o zhes pa'i
T02D1408:203b-33: don to // lhag ma ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:203b-34: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i snying po
T02D1408:203b-35: dang nye ba'i snying po'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u
T02D1408:203b-36: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1408:203b-38: // / de nas pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1408:203b-39: dur khrod kyi ras zhes bya ba ni dur khrod kyi ro'i gos so //
T02D1408:203b-40: ba'i 'o ma ni ba rang nyid kyi 'o ma'o //
T02D1408:203b-41: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i yi ge
T02D1408:203b-42: bdun dang rnal 'byor ma drug gi las kyi cho
T02D1408:203b-43: ga'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1408:203b-45: // / de nas las kyi rab mchog ni //
T02D1408:204a-1: bya ba la sogs pa la sna tshogs pa'i dngos grub ston to //
T02D1408:204a-2: rta gsod me tog dag gis ni //
T02D1408:204a-3: zhes pa'i rta gsod ni ka ra b'i ra'o //
T02D1408:204a-5: skye gnas rgya ni bcings nas su /
T02D1408:204a-6: zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi yan lag can dang kha sbyor du bya'o //
T02D1408:204a-7: gzhung gzhan gyi tshig ni rtogs sla'o //
T02D1408:204a-9: spra tshil gyis ni rab tu byugs //
T02D1408:204a-10: zhes pa ni spra tshil la gzugs brnyan byas la
T02D1408:204a-11: tsandan dmar po'i phye ma dang tsha ba gsum gyis
T02D1408:204a-12: byugs par bya zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1408:204a-13: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1408:204a-14: ma drug gi tshig grub pa dang dgug pa'i cho
T02D1408:204a-15: ga'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1408:204a-17: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1408:204a-18: ha rnam pa lnga lag par mnye zhing bskul tshig dang bcas pa ni gdams ngag ste /
T02D1408:204a-19: 'dir de'i yang gdams ngag ni rtag tu rnal 'byor
T02D1408:204a-20: ma'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bris pa'i sbyor bas ha rnam
T02D1408:204a-21: pa lnga lag pa'i dbus su dbang ldan nas go
T02D1408:204a-22: rims ma yin pas bri bar bya'o //
T02D1408:204a-23: gang gi rkang rjes kyi rdul dang dug dang khrag
T02D1408:204a-24: dang ske tshe lag pa gnyis kyi mthil du byug
T02D1408:204a-25: ste / de'i steng du ldong ros dang thod le
T02D1408:204a-26: kor la sogs pa ka bam rta'i smyu gus ha
T02D1408:204a-27: rnam pa lnga bris la sbyin sreg bya /
T02D1408:204a-28: de ltar bri bar rtogs pa'o //
T02D1408:204a-29: bya ba 'dir de bzhin du bltas la /
T02D1408:204a-30: seng ldeng gi sol ba 'am ro bsregs pa'i sol
T02D1408:204a-31: bas lag pa gnyis mnye zhing bskul tshig dang bcas
T02D1408:204a-32: pas sbyin sreg byas na kha nas khrag skyugs nas
T02D1408:204a-33: de ma thag tu dgra bo 'chi bar 'gyur ro
T02D1408:204a-35: rang gi khrag ni thod gnas pa //
T02D1408:204a-37: de ltar the tshom med pa nyid do //
T02D1408:204a-38: byi la la sogs pa'i sha mkha' 'gro ma rnams
T02D1408:204a-39: la shin tu bsngags par ston te byil la sogs
T02D1408:204a-40: pas so // dpa' bo zhes pa ni yi ge bdun pa'i sngags so //
T02D1408:204a-41: yi ge re re zhes pa ni yi ge'i grangs kyis 'bum bzlas pa bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:204a-42: yang na ji lta ba'i don du byas pa ste /
T02D1408:204a-43: de la yang 'bum phrag lnga zhes pa ni mngal 'pho ba ste /
T02D1408:204a-44: ji srid du khu tshur ma bkrol gyi bar du'o //
T02D1408:204a-45: lhag ma ni brjod pa'i don nyid do //
T02D1408:204a-46: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i ha lnga'i
T02D1408:204b-0: las kyi cho ga'i le'u @204b bzhi bcu rtsa drug
T02D1408:204b-2: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:204b-3: nyin zhag dang po la zhes pa ni dang po
T02D1408:204b-4: la stong phrag gsum sbyin sreg bya zhing phyis ni
T02D1408:204b-5: stong phrag brgyad bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1408:204b-7: ka ka na da'i 'bras bu zhes pa ni gando li'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1408:204b-8: khyir bya bar 'dod na ni zhes pa ni ro'i me tog dang so tog go //
T02D1408:204b-9: mgo bo zhes pa ni kha na ma thob med
T02D1408:204b-10: pa'i sre mo'i thod pa'i nang du gtogs par lcags
T02D1408:204b-11: kyi so tog gur gum dang lhan cig phye mar
T02D1408:204b-12: byas la ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su gnas pa
T02D1408:204b-14: bya chen po'i gnas zhes pa ni 'ug pa'i tshang ngo //
T02D1408:204b-15: ce sbyang gi mgo 'am 'bras so ba 'am ku sha dang bri ha ti'o //
T02D1408:204b-16: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i mkha' 'gro
T02D1408:204b-17: ma thams cad kyi sngags thams cad kyi cho ga'i
T02D1408:204b-18: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1408:204b-20: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D1408:204b-21: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying po'i sngags ston
T02D1408:204b-22: te / bzang po bris nas mchod par bya //
T02D1408:204b-23: zhes pa ni rlung dang me dang chu dang sa
T02D1408:204b-24: dang rus sbal dang sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang
T02D1408:204b-25: sna tshogs kyi padma'i steng du ri bdun gyis yongs
T02D1408:204b-26: su bskor ba'i ri rab bsams la /
T02D1408:204b-27: de'i steng du 'khor lo gsum la sogs pa'i rim pa nges par rdzogs pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1408:204b-28: dpa' bo rnams kyi dpa' nyid ni //
T02D1408:204b-29: zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D1408:204b-30: dpal he ru ka rgyal po zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:204b-32: he hee zhes pa ni 'khor lo gsum gyi lha
T02D1408:204b-33: rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi sngags chen po ha h'a'i
T02D1408:204b-35: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1408:204b-36: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1408:204b-37: zhes pa ni go rims ma yin pas bstan pa'i
T02D1408:204b-38: rdo rje sems dpa' dang rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D1408:204b-39: sogs pa dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams nam mkha' la
T02D1408:204b-40: 'gro ba dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi phyogs bsgom
T02D1408:204b-42: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis //
T02D1408:204b-44: ces pa ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1408:204b-45: dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro nyid //
T02D1408:204b-46: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:204b-47: bya ba kun la sgrub pa pos //
T02D1408:205a-0: @205a * // zhes pa ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs
T02D1408:205a-1: pa'i las thams cad la 'khor lo gsum dang ldan
T02D1408:205a-2: pa'i sngags pas bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don to
T02D1408:205a-4: 'khor lo bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya //
T02D1408:205a-8: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom pa zhes pa
T02D1408:205a-9: ni snying po'i sngags sam ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags
T02D1408:205a-10: bzla'o zhes bya'o // 'khor lo chen po zhes pa
T02D1408:205a-11: ni 'khor lo chen po ni tshogs gang yin pa
T02D1408:205a-12: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1408:205a-13: yang na 'khor lo gsum gang yin pa de ni
T02D1408:205a-14: de bzhin te yang na 'khor lo chen po zhes
T02D1408:205a-15: khyab par du byas pa'i bsdus pas 'khor lo gsum
T02D1408:205a-16: nyid gzung ba'o // yang nges par gzungs bas sngon gyi tshig khyab par gyi bsdu ba'o //
T02D1408:205a-17: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i mkha' 'gor
T02D1408:205a-18: ma thams cad kyi sngags thams cad kyi las kyi
T02D1408:205a-19: cho ga'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i 'grel ba'o
T02D1408:205a-21: / // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1408:205a-22: pas sngon du bstan pa'i phyugs kyi sgrub pa'i cho
T02D1408:205a-23: ga kha ma skong ba bstan te /
T02D1408:205a-24: dpal he ru kar bya ba gsal bar bya ba
T02D1408:205a-25: yan lag lnga ni thos bas mnam pa dang 'od
T02D1408:205a-26: dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa 'dis so //
T02D1408:205a-27: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i bsgrub bya
T02D1408:205a-28: skye ba bdun pa'i gzugs yongs su brje ba'i cho
T02D1408:205a-29: ga'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1408:205a-31: // / de thams cad nyid gzhan yang bstan to zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:205a-32: de nas zhes pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:205a-33: ba lang gi sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1408:205a-34: dbang du bya ba'i cho ga sngon du bstan pa'i
T02D1408:205a-35: cho gas bya'o // kha chu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la kha chu ni mchil ma'o //
T02D1408:205a-36: zos na rlon pa'i zas ni zos na skyug pa'o //
T02D1408:205a-37: ngad nyid mchog tu mchod ces pa ni thams cad
T02D1408:205a-38: nyid du gnyid sad pa dang gnas pa dang 'dug
T02D1408:205a-39: pa dang lhag ma dang bcas pa za ba dang
T02D1408:205a-40: bya ba byed pa dang 'khrig pa la sogs pa
T02D1408:205a-41: 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i sngags pas sngags bzlas par
T02D1408:205a-42: bya ba ste dus nges pa yod pa ma yin
T02D1408:205a-44: sreg blugs brgya zhes pa ni aarka'i yam shing la
T02D1408:205b-0: @205b sogs pa rgyas pa'i cho gas sreg bzlugs brgya
T02D1408:205b-1: ji snyed zla ba gcig tu sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1408:205b-2: de'i tshe dbul ba thams cad nyams par ston pa'o //
T02D1408:205b-3: sha chen dag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:205b-4: lha rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur te /
T02D1408:205b-5: zhes pa ni gal te nus pa skyes pa'i sngags
T02D1408:205b-6: pas thun gnyis su mnyam par gzhag pa'i sngags pas
T02D1408:205b-7: sbyin sreg byas na de'i tshe lha thams cad dang
T02D1408:205b-9: brtson 'grus chen po la sogs pa thams cad du
T02D1408:205b-10: gnyis kar yang sbyin sreg bya zhes pa'i don to
T02D1408:205b-11: // bi la ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1408:205b-12: sngon bzhin du rgyas pa'i cho gar rtogs par bya'o
T02D1408:205b-13: // // phyugs kyi sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:205b-14: yang dang yang du go ma yu'i sbyin sreg bya
T02D1408:205b-15: ba ni sreg rdzas gzhan rnams kyi nang nas phul
T02D1408:205b-17: brtul zhugs gtsang sbra med na yang /
T02D1408:205b-18: bstan pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1408:205b-19: zhes pa ni gang yang brtul zhugs kyang med phyi rol gyi gtsang sbra yang med kyang /
T02D1408:205b-20: de ltar na yang 'dis spyad bzhin pas rnal 'byor
T02D1408:205b-21: pas khyad par can gyi lha'i bkas dngos grub thob
T02D1408:205b-23: 'dis ni dpal mchog gtso bo'i bdag nyid che bar bstan to //
T02D1408:205b-24: lhag pa'i tsher 'gyur zhes pa ni lhag pa'i tshe
T02D1408:205b-25: ni 'chi ba yang tshe dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o
T02D1408:205b-26: // kus manta zhes pa la sogs pa ni kus
T02D1408:205b-27: manta'i sa bon dang mud ga dang ma sha dang
T02D1408:205b-28: gtso mo'i sa bon dang sbrang rtsi'i tshigs ma ste
T02D1408:205b-29: sbra tshil dang ske tshe dang 'di thams cad mnyam
T02D1408:205b-30: por byas la gang gis ming nas bzung snying po'i
T02D1408:205b-31: sngags la sogs pas bskul tshig gis khyim gyi phyogs
T02D1408:205b-33: ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1408:205b-34: gzhung gzhan las khyim gyi 'dab ma'i lo ma zhes pa ni khyim la 'chang ba'i dud pa'o //
T02D1408:205b-36: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i dbang dang
T02D1408:205b-37: gnas la sogs pa bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u lnga
T02D1408:205b-40: // / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:205b-41: gos ni zhes pa ni gcer bu'i gzugs so //
T02D1408:206a-0: phyag rgya lnga sogs zhes pa @206a * //
T02D1408:206a-1: ni mgo bo'i nor bu dang /
T02D1408:206a-5: mchod phyir thogs pa dang thal ba'o //
T02D1408:206a-6: shes rab yan lag ces pa ni las kyi phyag
T02D1408:206a-7: rgya la sogs pa'i yan lag dang lus kyi brda
T02D1408:206a-8: rnams mkha' 'gro ba'i lus kyi mtshan nyid dang dpa'
T02D1408:206a-9: bo'i yan lag gi bye brag dang g-yon pa'i spyod
T02D1408:206a-10: pa dang gtsang sbra dang dam tshig gi spyod pa
T02D1408:206a-11: dang bzhad pa dang gar la sogs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D1408:206a-12: dang tshogs kyi rim pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1408:206a-13: gzhung gzhan ni shes rab yan lag rdo rje ni
T02D1408:206a-14: phur bu dang ra ba dang gur la sogs pa'o
T02D1408:206a-15: // shes rab kyi yan lag nyid dang dbyer mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1408:206a-16: phur bu zhes pa ni rdo rje phur bu dgu dang rdo rje brdung ba'i tho pa yang ngo //
T02D1408:206a-17: dra ba zhes pa ni rdo rje gur dang ra ba dang sa gzhi yang ngo //
T02D1408:206a-18: rim pa yin par go bar bya'o //
T02D1408:206a-19: a'a li k'a li zhes pa ni a'a'i ni aal sogs pa'o //
T02D1408:206a-20: k'a li ni ka la sogs pa'o //
T02D1408:206a-21: rgyu sogs tong pa sngon 'gro ba //
T02D1408:206a-22: zhes pa ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med
T02D1408:206a-23: pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par 'du
T02D1408:206a-25: stong pa nyid dang smon pa med pa ni ru ste de'i phyir brjod pa'i don nyid ni ru'o //
T02D1408:206a-26: ka ni gang du mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1408:206a-27: shr'i ni gnyis su med pa'i don no //
T02D1408:206a-28: sngon du 'jug pa la n'a da la sogs pa'i bar ro //
T02D1408:206a-29: ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ba zhes pa ni srid
T02D1408:206a-30: pa zhes pa nas bzung ste 'khor lo gsum gyi
T02D1408:206a-31: lha nye bar bsdu'o zhes pa'i bar ro //
T02D1408:206a-32: bdud rtsis tshim byed ces pa ni rgyas pa dang
T02D1408:206a-33: zhi ba'i cho gas sngon du gsungs pa'i bkod pa'i
T02D1408:206a-34: go cha la sogs pa lag pa g-yon pa spyi
T02D1408:206a-35: bor gzhag ste 'bar bar dmigs pa'o //
T02D1408:206a-36: ji ltar g-yon pa'i lag par bkod pa'i bdud rtsi
T02D1408:206a-37: dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i yi ge bdun pa zla
T02D1408:206a-38: ba'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa yi ge bdun pa
T02D1408:206a-39: rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha dang rnal 'byor
T02D1408:206a-40: bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor la bkod pa'i ha lnga mgo
T02D1408:206a-41: bo dang dpral ba dang mig gnyis dang kha dang
T02D1408:206a-42: mgrin pa dang snying gar bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1408:206a-43: yi ge bdun pa de bzhin du bdud rtsis tshim
T02D1408:206a-44: zhing spyi bo nas 'bab par bya'o //
T02D1408:206b-0: de nas sbar ba dang spro ba'i sngags kyis @206b
T02D1408:206b-1: yongs su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa'i bdud
T02D1408:206b-2: rtsi la sogs pa bza' ba bkod pa'o //
T02D1408:206b-3: go cha'i sngags la sogs pa lag pa g-yon par bkod de thams cad kyang bza' ba'o //
T02D1408:206b-4: g-yon pa'i bdud rtsis tshim pa'i bde ba'i khyad par ni gdams ngag gi don to //
T02D1408:206b-5: mya ngan 'das zhes pa ni mya ngan 'das ni
T02D1408:206b-6: phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i
T02D1408:206b-7: ngo bo nyid mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad
T02D1408:206b-8: du nyon mongs pa'i sdom par rtag tu gnas pa
T02D1408:206b-9: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo nyid rtag
T02D1408:206b-10: pa dang chad pa dang dbu ma thams cad du
T02D1408:206b-11: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dngos po
T02D1408:206b-12: thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kha cig gis rnyed
T02D1408:206b-13: par dka' ba lha rdzas kyi rig pa mchog gi
T02D1408:206b-14: ngo bo nyid bla ma dam pa yongs su mnyes
T02D1408:206b-15: pa las shes par bya ba dpa' bo dang rnal
T02D1408:206b-17: lag pa'i mchod pa ni zhes pa ni de nyid
T02D1408:206b-18: lag pas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rnam pa g-yon pa'i
T02D1408:206b-19: lag pa la gsang ba dang cig shos kyi mchod
T02D1408:206b-20: par bya'o // de ltar g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i
T02D1408:206b-21: lag pa gnyis bskor bas mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba
T02D1408:206b-22: par bya'o // dam pa'o // dbang bskur ba zhes pa ni phyir mi ldog pa dang /
T02D1408:206b-34: go cha chen po zhes pa ni /
T02D1408:206b-35: pull'i ra ma la ya la sogs pa'i sa chen
T02D1408:206b-36: po dang lha'i 'khor lo dang srung ba'i 'khor lo
T02D1408:206b-38: yang na pu la sogs pas sa chen por sngags
T02D1408:206b-39: kyi dkyil 'khor dag srung ba'i 'khor lo dang ste
T02D1408:206b-40: pull'i ra ma la ya la sogs pa'i don to
T02D1408:206b-41: // sngags rnams zhes pa ni a'a li k'a li
T02D1408:206b-42: la sogs pa'i don to zhes bya ba ste zhes
T02D1408:206b-43: // bcu bzhi'o // lhag ma ni go sla'o //
T02D1408:206b-44: mtho ris longs spyod ces pa ni 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i longs spyod gang yin pa'o /
T02D1408:206b-46: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1408:206b-47: ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig
T02D1408:206b-49: / dpal ldan bde mchog t'i k'a rjod byed rjes ma 'brangs //
T02D1408:207a-0: @207a * // rnal 'byor bla med rgyud dang brjod bya'i rjes 'brang mchog //
T02D1408:207a-1: zab cing rgya che'i ngo bo dngos grub rang bzhin te //
T02D1408:207a-2: dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang phyug ma lus yon tan gnas //
T02D1408:207a-3: gcig tu thams cad bsdus pa mthun par 'dod pas bris //
T02D1408:207a-4: dpal ldan dpa' bo rdo rjes byas //
T02D1408:207a-5: spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras ster ba'i //
T02D1408:207a-6: mchog sbyin 'di ni bris pa las //
T02D1408:207a-7: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags pa //
T02D1408:207a-8: de yis 'jig rten ma lus kun //
T02D1408:207a-9: myur du bde mchog thob par shog / ma lus
T02D1408:207a-10: pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi gnas zhes bya ba
T02D1408:207a-11: nga ba la bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnam 'grel slob
T02D1408:207a-12: dpon chen po dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D1408:207a-14: / khams pa ba ri lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen grags pa dang /
